tasks.label: Setup Database
tasks.command: export $(xargs < ${workspaceFolder}/.env) && python tests/setup_test_db.py clean && python tests/setup_test_db.py init

tasks.label: Init Function Env
tasks.command: cat ${workspaceFolder}/.env | xargs -L 1 python -c "import sys; p = sys.argv[1].split('='); p[1] = \"=\".join(p[1:]); print(f'func settings add {p[0]} \"{p[1]}\";')" | { message=$(</dev/stdin) && eval $message; };
